package step4;

public class MyThread extends Thread{

	private int a;
	public MyThread(int a) {
		if(a!=0) 
			this.a=a;
	}
	public void run() {
		int result=1;
		 try {
				Thread.currentThread().sleep(1500);
			} catch (InterruptedException e) {
				// TODO Auto-generated catch block
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		for (int i =1; i <=a; i++) {
			result=result*i;
		}
		System.out.println(result);
	}
}
